# Site Information
Site: AnandRochlani
Description: A modern learning platform offering expert-led courses and insightful blog content in web development, design, and data science.
Language: en-US

# Content Guidelines
- Focus on educational content about web development, design, and data science
- Courses are structured learning paths with modules and lessons
- Blog posts provide tutorials, best practices, and industry insights
- All content is original and created by industry professionals

# Contact
Contact: contact@anandrochlani.com

# Content Types
- Courses: Comprehensive learning programs with modules, lessons, and hands-on projects
- Blog Posts: Articles covering web development, design principles, and data science topics
- Resources: Educational content and learning materials

# Update Frequency
- Courses: Updated monthly
- Blog Posts: Published weekly
- Content is regularly reviewed and updated
